verses.verse: I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> again <S%H7200><s%>, and looked, and behold a man <S%H376><s%> with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H1980><s%>, Where go you <S%H559><s%>? And he said unto me <S%H4058><s%>, To measure Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the breadth <S%H7341><s%> there <S%H753><s%>, and what is the length there.
And <S%H4397><s%>, behold, the angel that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet him <S%H7125><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7323><s%>, Run, speak <S%H1696><s%> to this <S%H1975><s%> young man <S%H5288><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as towns without walls <S%H6519><s%> for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> in it <S%H8432><s%>:

For I <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, will be unto her a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and will be the glory <S%H3519><s%> in the midst of her <S%H8432><s%>.

Ho <S%H1945><s%>, ho <S%H1945><s%>, come forth <S%H5127><s%>, and flee from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for I have spread you abroad <S%H6566><s%> as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Deliver <S%H4422><s%> yourself <S%H1945><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>, that dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; After <S%H310><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> has he sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto the nations <S%H1471><s%> which spoiled <S%H7997><s%> you <S%H5060><s%>: for he that touches you touches <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye <S%H5869><s%>.

For <S%H5130><s%>, behold, I will shake my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon them <S%H7998><s%>, and they shall be a plunder to their servants <S%H5647><s%>: and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent me <S%H7971><s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: for <S%H935><s%>, behold, I come, and I will live <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>: and I will live <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H3045><s%>, and you shall know that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent me unto you <S%H7971><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> his portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land <S%H127><s%>, and shall choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem again <S%H3389><s%>.
Be silent <S%H2013><s%>, O all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for he is raised up <S%H5782><s%> out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>.
